Summary: Bright red/orange flame with smoke trail smaller than object.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving up hwy 665, about .25 miles from the hwy 55 intersection. I looked North East towards New Orleans and saw something that looked like a flare but larger and slower. I looked for an aircraft but didn't see any. The duration was a lot longer than a arieal flare. This is cliche, but as soon as I picked up my phone to call my wife, after the first ring it disapeared. My feeling at the time was excitement.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Montegut
There were no other sightings in Montegut on or around April 13th 2009
